messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Alright folks, remember to activate suit sensors if you value your life and have a safe shift

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: If you or anyone you come across is mutated, please bring them to medbay for treatment

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Semi-Competent Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to budget-cuts, a swarm of squeaking things have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our omnipotence, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Can the magic talking space shark meet me at arrivals? I need to sort this shit out, this is not in the protocol manual at all

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: The talking shark is confirmed non-hostile, dont beat it up

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Mining Dock.

messages.author: Phillip Poehl (Head of Personnel)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">dick dick dick if you read this you're gay so how about genocide heil honkler for it is a G O D</font>
